entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
